metadata.description:
The amorous and versatile 17-years-old Yamato Majima live by himself in the town where beastly and horny guys were everywhere! From the cute delinquent fellow, timid childhood friend, sparkling boy idol, hot hosts, to sexy teachers. Yamato's love and sex life are deliciously restless!
 
ESCAPE is adapted from a big hit BL Game that involved 20 hot and beautiful partner you can choose for Yamato!
metadata.name: ESCAPE (Yaoi Manga)
